titleStmt.title: The true copie of a letter from Mr Ashburnham, to a friend, concerning his deportment towards the King in his late attendance upon His Majesties person at Hampton-Court, and the Isle of VVight.
titleStmt.author: Ashburnham, John, 1600-1648.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 2d"; the 8 in imprint is crossed out and replaced with a "7".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
